title: Wanted: Graded T206s - See List UPDATED
author: quinnsryche

posts.post_title: Wanted: Graded T206s - See List UPDATED
posts.post_content:
I need the following T206 cards in PSA 4-5 or SGC 50-60 in the following order (send scans & prices to [url]quinnsryche@comcast.net[/url] if you wish) 1. Doc White - Portrait, 2. Billy Sullivan, 3. Patsy Dougherty - Portrait, 4. Fielder Jones - Portrait, 5. Bill Bergen - Batting, 6. Ginger Beaumont, 7. George Gibson.
Thanks!
OK how about these Polar Bear backs, same qualifications as above: 1. Merkle - Throwing, 2. Warhop, 3. Doyle - Batting, 4. Kleinow - Catching NY, 5. Nattress, 6. Snodgrass - Catching, 7. Titus, 8. Meyers, 9. Taylor, 10. McLean, 11. Rhodes - Portrait, 12. Herzog - Boston.
Thanks, again!

Quinnsryche,
 
Just FYI - none of the seven cards you are looking for exist with a Polar Bear back.  They are all 150/350 Series subjects, which are known only to exist with El Principe de Gales, Hindu, Old Mill, Piedmont, Sovereign and Sweet Caporal backs.
 
Thought you'd want to know.
 
Steve

Thanks! I'm relatively new at this and that kind of info helps. Is there any website or listing that shows which cards are found with what backs?
Most appreciated,
Tony

Tony,
 
Scot Reader's "Inside T206" manuscript is IMHO the best T206 reference guide out there.  He just updated it earlier this year. The link is below.
 
Steve
 
[url]http://www.oldcardboard.com/t/t206/t206.asp?cardsetID=699[/url]

Thanks so much for the help.
God Bless,
tony

As I read Tony's want list I think he might just be looking for the following 12 subjects with Polar Bear.  These 12 are NOT 150/350 subjects and many if not all of them are possible with Polar Bear.  So keep up the quest, Tony!

1. Merkle - Throwing -- 460-only subject
2. Warhop -- 350-only subject
3. Doyle - Batting -- 350/460 RP subject
4. Kleinow - Catching NY -- 350-only subject
5. Nattress -- 350-only subject
6. Snodgrass - Catching -- 350/460 RP subject
7. Titus -- 350-only subject
8. Meyers -- 460-only subject
9. Taylor -- 350-only subject
10. McLean -- 350-only subject
11. Rhodes - Portrait -- 350-only subject
12. Herzog - Boston -- 460-only subject

Scot
they are possible with Polar Bear although some may be a no print.

[quote name="cfc1909" post=759252]they are possible with Polar Bear although some may be a no print.[/QUOTE]

Hi Jim,

All twelve do exist with PB back - none are a no-print.  (Did I just use a double negative?)  :eek:
